org.openscience.cdk.formula.rules
Class ChargeRule

java.lang.Object
  org.openscience.cdk.formula.rules.ChargeRule
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRule
public class ChargeRule
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRule

This class validate if the charge in the IMolecularFormula correspond with a specific value. As default it is defined as neutral == 0.0.

This rule uses these parameters:

Name Default Description
charge 0.0 The Charge of MolecularFormula

Author:
miguelrojasch
Created on:
2007-11-20
Belongs to CDK module:
formula

                throws CDKException
Validate the charge of this IMolecularFormula.
